help.en-US:
Type $<approveSubCommandMention> `$<channelOptionDescription> $<messageOptionDescription>` to approve the author of `$<messageOptionDescription>` in `$<channelOptionDescription>`
Type $<refuseSubCommandMention> `$<channelOptionDescription> $<messageOptionDescription>` to refuse the author of `$<messageOptionDescription>` in `$<channelOptionDescription>`
help.fr:
Tape $<approveSubCommandMention> `$<channelOptionDescription> $<messageOptionDescription>` pour approuver l'auteur d'`$<messageOptionDescription>` dans `$<channelOptionDescription>`
Tape $<refuseSubCommandMention> `$<channelOptionDescription> $<messageOptionDescription>` pour refuser l'auteur d'`$<messageOptionDescription>` dans `$<channelOptionDescription>`
help.pt-BR:
Digite $<approveSubCommandMention> `$<channelOptionDescription> $<messageOptionDescription>` pra aprovar o autor de `$<messageOptionDescription>` em `$<channelOptionDescription>`
Digite $<refuseSubCommandMention> `$<channelOptionDescription> $<messageOptionDescription>` pra recusar o autor de `$<messageOptionDescription>` em `$<channelOptionDescription>`

noChannelReply.en-US: I do not know any channel with this tag.
noChannelReply.fr: Je ne connais aucun salon avec cette étiquette.
noChannelReply.pt-BR: Não conheço nenhum canal com essa marcação.

noMessageReply.en-US: I do not know any message with this identifier in this channel.
noMessageReply.fr: Je ne connais aucun message avec cet identifiant dans ce salon.
noMessageReply.pt-BR: Não sei nenhuma mensagem com essa identificação nesse canal.
